name: Policy Exceptions and Approvals
description: Combines exception handling with approval chains

theory.natural_language: Remote access requires VPN. An exception can be granted by the security lead for a two-week window. Emergency responders may connect without VPN during incidents. Analyst Jane has an approved exception ending in fourteen days. Bob is an emergency responder today.

queries.natural_language: May Jane connect without VPN right now?

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes. She has an active two-week exception approved by the security lead.
expected_answer.explanation: AnalystJane HAS exception_active true ∧ exception granted

queries.natural_language: Can Bob connect without VPN during the incident?

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes. As an emergency responder on an incident day, he may connect without VPN.
expected_answer.explanation: Bob IS_A emergency_responder ∧ today IS incident_day ∧ emergency_responder MAY_CONNECT_WITHOUT vpn

queries.natural_language: Is remote access allowed without VPN for other users?

expected_answer.natural_language: No. Without an exception or emergency status, VPN is required.
